#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long

LL F[10005],mod=1000000007;

LL dp[5005][5005];
LL COM(int n,int r)
{
    if(r==1) return n;
    if(n==r) return 1;
    if(dp[n][r]!=-1) return dp[n][r];
        else{
        dp[n][r]=(COM(n-1,r)+COM(n-1,r-1))%mod;
        return dp[n][r];
    }


}
LL GUN[5005];
int main()
{
    memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
    LL k,S=1;
    for(k=1;k<=5000;k++)
    {
        if(k==1)S*=26;
        else S*=25;
        S=S%mod;
        GUN[k]=S;
    }

    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int kk;
    for(kk=1;kk<=t;kk++)
    {
        LL n;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        LL i,M,ANS=0;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {

            M = GUN[i];
           LL X = COM(n,i)%mod;
            X = (X*X)%mod;
            ANS+= X*M;
            ANS%=mod;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ANS);
    }

}
